title: Insights into docking in megasynthases from investigation of the toblerol trans-AT polyketide synthase: many α-helical means to an end
content:
RSC Chem. Biol., 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4CB00075G, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Serge Scat, Kira Weissman, Benjamin Chagot
The fidelity of biosynthesis by modular polyketide synthases (PKSs) depends on specific, moderate affinity interactions between successive polypeptide subunits mediated by docking domains (DDs). These sequence elements are notably portable,...
